participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: Skateboarding is a hobby of mine. I have a crush on my co worker. I go to college part time. I almost always wear a t shirt and jeans. I love candy.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and sporty, enjoys deep conversations and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I love reading mysteries in my free time. I'm pursuing my law degree. I am the youngest of 3. I love playing tennis. I went to college in Chicago.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading mysteries, playing tennis, and spending time with my family.
Me too! I love reading mysteries and playing sports. What's your favorite mystery book?
I really enjoyed the "Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out. What kind of sports do you play?
I love playing tennis and basketball. I also like to go hiking and biking.
That's awesome! I love hiking and biking too. I play basketball sometimes, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, I'm not very good at tennis either. We can practice together sometime.
That would be great! I'm always looking for someone to play sports with.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm excited to get to know you better.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
